visual_tags: Hair: Messy dark brown hair with a cowlick sticking up
Eyes: Large, expressive black eyes behind thick-rimmed glasses
Top: Bright yellow Hawaiian shirt with blue palm trees (stained with soy sauce later)
Bottom: Beige cargo shorts with too many pockets
Accessories: Bulky DSLR camera on a rainbow strap around neck
Footwear: Red high-top sneakers with white soles

description.physical: Average height, slightly chubby build, round expressive face. messy dark hair.
description.personality: Optimistic, oblivious, cowardly but motivated by food, quick-witted when panicked.

gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card
